questions:
What is the main subject of the photo?
A) A tree
B) A rock with plants
C) A river
D) A building

What is the prominent feature in the center of the photo?
A) A large rock
B) A small animal
C) A bench
D) A flower

What type of plants are visible in the photo?
A) Trees
B) Bushes
C) Grass and small plants
D) Cacti

What is the condition of the plants in the photo?
A) Lush and green
B) Dry and yellowish
C) Covered in flowers
D) None present

What is the texture of the rock in the center of the photo?
A) Smooth and polished
B) Rough and weathered
C) Covered in moss
D) Painted

What is in the background of the photo?
A) A forest
B) A body of water
C) More rocks and grass
D) Buildings

What is in the foreground of the photo?
A) A pathway
B) Pebbles and small rocks
C) A bench
D) A person

What is the lighting condition in the photo?
A) Bright and sunny
B) Cloudy and overcast
C) Nighttime
D) Indoors with artificial light

What kind of environment does the photo depict?
A) Urban
B) Coastal
C) Rocky and natural
D) Agricultural

What is the color of the large rock in the center?
A) Red
B) Blue
C) Gray
D) White

What element is not present in the photo?
A) Water
B) Rocks
C) Plants
D) Soil

What is the relationship between the rock and the plants?
A) The plants are growing on the rock
B) The plants are growing around the rock
C) The plants are far from the rock
D) The plants are covering the rock

What is the main focus of the photo?
A) The interaction between rocks and plants
B) A scenic landscape
C) Wildlife activity
D) Human activity

What kind of plant is directly in front of the large rock?
A) A flowering plant
B) A grass-like plant
C) A tree sapling
D) A bush

What is the texture of the ground in the photo?
A) Sandy
B) Rocky
C) Muddy
D) Grassy

What is the state of the vegetation in the photo?
A) Thriving and dense
B) Sparse and dry
C) Recently planted
D) Overgrown and wild

What is the size of the rocks in the foreground compared to the large rock in the center?
A) Much larger
B) Slightly larger
C) Smaller
D) The same size

What is the primary color palette of the photo?
A) Green and blue
B) Brown and red
C) Gray and yellow
D) Black and white

How many distinct types of plants can be seen in the photo?
A) None
B) One
C) Two
D) Three or more

A) Covered in graffiti

C) Rough with natural indentations

D) Wet and shiny

What is the relationship between the plants and the lighting?

B) The plants are in direct sunlight

D) High angle, looking down

What is the condition of the ground in the background?
A) Covered in grass
B) Covered in rocks
